page.title: 04Sources of Income
page.content: There is 1 hotel and several boarding houses. A lot of self catering in houses,flats,caravans and tents. A Leisure Centre, Holiday Camp and Holiday complex with clubs,cafes etc., cater for thousands of visitors during the holiday period. Attraction of sand,sea and golf. Shops for consumer food in winter, chemist,wool shop, Off licence, post office,betting shop. Garden produce, garage,launderette.Summer additions - Momento and souvenir shops. Clothes, sweets, ice cream, jewellers, 'take away' food shops. No big employer. Largely seasonal and connected with the tourist trade. High unemployment in winter months. Laver picked,edible seaweed,cleaned for sale Tourism is very important. Westward Ho classed as major holiday resort by Devon C C and suitable for development
